cont.entity_a: Provides minimal security. Not recommended for high-security needs.
cont.entity_b: Design makes it difficult for thieves to cut. Offers good protection against bolt cutters.

cont.entity_a: Broke after a few uses and is unreliable. Lacks durability.
cont.entity_b: Rusts quickly when used outdoors. Failed after minimal use, requiring a locksmith to remove.

cont.entity_a: May seize up in wet weather conditions.
cont.entity_b: Has a drainage issue that leads to freezing in cold weather.

cont.entity_a: Visually distinctive with multiple color options.
cont.entity_b: Sturdy and fits well with specific storage systems. Sharp edges can cause injury.

cont.entity_a: Comes with two keys and operates smoothly. Color-coded keys help with identification.
cont.entity_b: Keys are flimsy and prone to breaking.

cont.entity_a: Can be cut with bolt cutters.
